issue.title: Feature "diffusion" in ressource type
issue.body:
**Original author :** Mérour Xavier

If disactivated in BE, the feature "diffusion" is not available which is OK.
But roles "diffusion manager" and "extraction manager" remain available under the ressource in FE.

It should not be the case.

**Fixed versions :** 4.2.0

comments.body:
**Original author :** Magoni Bruno

Thanks to Steering Committee members to vote on such feature...
